name: Analog Watch International
description: Classic analog watch with minimalist design, perfect for everyday wear. Features a stainless steel case and Japanese quartz movement.

name: Bulgari Bangle Watch
image: watches images/Bulgari Watch Jewellery Bangle Bezel.png
description: Luxury jewelry watch combining Swiss precision with Italian design. 18k gold bangle with diamond bezel and mother-of-pearl dial.

name: Bulgari Ring Watch
image: watches images/Bulgari Watch Jewellery Ring Luxury goods.png
description: Extraordinary ring watch with hidden time display. Set with brilliant-cut diamonds and crafted in rose gold.

name: Casio Edifice
description: Solar-powered chronograph with tachymeter scale. 100m water resistant with stainless steel band and sapphire-coated glass.

name: Citizen Eco-Drive
description: Light-powered technology eliminates battery changes. Features date display, luminous hands, and scratch-resistant mineral crystal.

name: Hamilton Jazzmaster
description: Inspired by musical instruments, this automatic watch features an open-heart design revealing the balance wheel.

name: Vacheron Constantin Geneva Seal
image: watches images/Geneva Seal Vacheron Constantin Watch.png
description: Haute horology timepiece bearing the prestigious Geneva Seal. Manual-wind movement with 58-hour power reserve.

name: Hamilton Automatic
image: watches images/Hamilton Watch Company Automatic watch.png
description: American spirit with Swiss precision. Features H-10 movement with 80-hour power reserve and date function.

name: Hamilton Classic
description: Timeless design with Swiss quartz movement. Stainless steel case with sapphire crystal and 50m water resistance.

name: Jaeger-LeCoultre Automatic
description: Master Control Date with 70-hour power reserve. Silver sunray-brushed dial with applied indexes.

name: Casio G-Shock Master
image: watches images/Master of G-Shock Shock-resistant watch Casio.png
description: Tactical shock-resistant watch with solar power and atomic timekeeping. Mud resistant with LED backlight.

name: Jido Automatic
description: Mechanical automatic movement with exhibition caseback. Skeletonized dial showing the intricate movement.

name: Montblanc Automatic
description: Heritage collection with in-house MB 24.17 movement. Silver guilloché dial with Roman numerals.

name: Omega Seamaster Co-Axial
image: watches images/Omega SA Omega Seamaster Coaxial.png
description: Professional 300m diver with co-axial escapement. Ceramic bezel and helium escape valve.

name: Omega Quartz
image: watches images/Omega SA Watch Jewellery Quartz clock.png
description: Elegant ladies' watch with diamond markers. Quartz precision with mother-of-pearl dial.

name: Patek Philippe Calibre
image: watches images/Patek Philippe Calibre Patek Philipp.png
description: Complicated manual-wind movement with perpetual calendar. 18k gold case with sapphire caseback.

name: Rado Watch
description: High-tech ceramic case with scratch-resistant surface. Automatic movement with date display.

name: Rolex Daytona
description: Iconic chronograph with tachymetric scale. 4130 movement with 72-hour power reserve.

name: Rolex Submariner
description: Legendary dive watch with 300m water resistance. Cerachrom bezel and Oystersteel case.

name: Rolex Datejust
description: Genuine Rolex Oyster bracelet. Stainless steel with Oysterclasp and Easylink extension.

name: Rado Watch Daytona
description: Ceramic chronograph with automatic movement. Column-wheel mechanism and vertical clutch.

name: Rolex GMT Master II
description: Dual timezone watch with 24-hour rotatable bezel. Calibre 3285 with 70-hour power reserve.

name: Vintage Analog Watch
image: watches images/round analog watch with gold-colored.png
description: Retro-styled watch with aged leather strap. Hand-wind mechanical movement.

name: Black Rolex Analog
image: watches images/round black Rolex analog watch.png
description: Oyster Perpetual with black sunray dial. Superlative chronometer certified.

name: Gold Rolex Analog
description: Day-Date 40 in 18k yellow gold. President bracelet with fluted bezel.

name: Carrera Chronograph
description: Legendary racing chronograph with silver panda dial. Calibre Heuer 02 movement.

name: IWC Schaffhausen
description: Pilot's watch with soft-iron inner case. Date and day display with 72-hour power reserve.

name: Cartier Tank Watch
image: watches images/Cartier Tank Watch Jewellery Cartier Santos.png
description: Iconic rectangular watch with Roman numerals and blue sword-shaped hands. Features a sapphire cabochon crown and Swiss quartz movement.

name: Tissot Analog
description: Classic dress watch with Swiss quartz movement. Sapphire crystal and 50m water resistance.

name: Tissot Automatic
description: Powermatic 80 with 80-hour power reserve. Exhibition caseback showing decorated movement.

name: Tissot Wristwatch
description: Elegant ladies' watch with mother-of-pearl dial. Swiss quartz movement with date window.

name: Vacheron Constantin Automatic
description: Patrimony collection with ultra-thin automatic movement. 18k white gold case.

name: Vacheron Constantin Gold
description: Traditionnelle complete calendar in 18k rose gold. Moon phase and day/night indicator.

name: Casio Edifice G-Shock
description: Hybrid Edifice-G-Shock model with shock resistance and chronograph functions.

name: Casio Edifice Sapphire
description: Premium Edifice model with sapphire crystal and solar charging. 200m water resistance.

name: Chronograph Clock
description: Regulateur-style chronograph with onion crown. Manual-wind column-wheel chronograph.

name: Gold Quartz Chronograph
image: watches images/Watch Quartz clock Chronograph Strap Gold.png
description: Elegant gold-plated chronograph with diamond markers. Mother-of-pearl dial.

name: Seiko Watch Strap
image: watches images/Watch strap Watch Strap Seiko.png
description: Premium leather strap compatible with multiple Seiko models. Alligator pattern with deployment clasp.

name: TAG Heuer Watch
description: Carrera chronograph with Heuer 02 movement. 80-hour power reserve and sapphire caseback.

name: Omega Speedmaster Professional Moonwatch
image: watches images/Omega Speedmaster Watch Omega SA Chronograph.png
description: The legendary Moonwatch with manual-wind caliber 3861 movement. Features hesalite crystal, tachymeter bezel, and NASA-certified chronograph. Black dial with iconic subdials and 50m water resistance.

name: Breitling Navitimer
description: Iconic pilot chronograph with circular slide rule bezel. COSC-certified chronometer with 70-hour power reserve.

name: Cartier Ballon Bleu
description: Elegant round case with integrated crown protector. Automatic movement with blue cabochon crown and Roman numeral dial.

name: Seiko Presage Cocktail Time
description: Dress watch inspired by cocktail bars. Sunburst dial with automatic movement and stainless steel bracelet.

name: Panerai Luminor Marina
description: Distinctive cushion case with crown guard. In-house movement with 3-day power reserve and small seconds.

name: Audemars Piguet Royal Oak
description: Luxury sports watch with octagonal bezel and 'Tapisserie' dial. Integrated bracelet with automatic movement.

name: Bremont ALT1-P Chronograph
description: British aviation chronograph with hardened steel case. COSC-certified chronometer with vintage pilot style.

name: Chanel J12 White Ceramic
description: Luxury fashion watch with high-resistance ceramic case and bracelet. Automatic Swiss movement with sporty elegance.

name: Fossil Grant Chronograph
description: Affordable chronograph with Roman numerals and leather strap. Quartz movement with stopwatch functionality.

name: Breguet Classique
description: Timeless elegance with guilloché dial and blued Breguet hands. Manual-wind movement with transparent caseback.

name: Hublot Big Bang
description: Bold fusion of materials with ceramic and rubber. Skeletonized chronograph dial with automatic movement.

name: Skagen Mesh Minimalist
description: Scandinavian design with slim profile and mesh bracelet. Clean dial powered by quartz movement.

name: Bell & Ross BR 03-92
description: Square case inspired by aviation instruments. Automatic movement with luminous numerals and 100m water resistance.

name: Nixon Time Teller
description: Modern minimalist design with bold colors. Quartz movement with adjustable stainless steel band.

name: Timex Expedition Scout
description: Rugged outdoor watch with Indiglo backlight. Nylon strap and water resistance up to 50 meters.

name: Movado Museum Classic
description: Signature dot dial with minimalist aesthetic. Swiss quartz movement with black leather strap.
